outstanding.label: OUTSTANDING
outstanding.description: Moby approves! Accessible to virtually everyone.

good.label: GOOD
good.description: Minor improvements needed. Most users can access content.

requires_improvement.label: REQUIRES IMPROVEMENT
requires_improvement.description: Significant barriers exist. Some disabled users cannot use site.

inadequate.label: INADEQUATE
inadequate.description: Major accessibility failures. Many disabled users excluded.

critical.label: CRITICAL
critical.description: Immediate action required. Legal risk, user safety concerns.

tagline: Like a good dog, your website should be excited to greet everyone - no matter how they arrive at the door.
